item.title: Day 3 (10th September 2021)
item.content:encoded:
Zoom link: TBA

Discord link: TBA

Add to your calendar: .iCal file

  • 00:00 SPECIAL: Asia Pacific session
  • 09:00 Speaking session 4 / Lightning talks
  • 10:30 Virtual coffee break
  • 11:00 End of morning session
  • 15:00 Plenary panel and formal close
  • 16:30 Social event
  • 18:00 End of meeting

All times are reported in Grenwich Mean Time (GMT) / UTC +0, please see Program overview for conversions into your local time.

You may need to adjust for Daylight Saving Time, particularly if you are in the United Kingdom.

item.title: Abstract submission now Closed!
item.description: Abstract submissions has now closed. The deadline for submissions was 13th July 2021.
item.content:encoded:
Abstract submissions are now closed for CampyUK goes global 2021.

You can still register to attend using this link: https://forms.gle/6ek3b6s6TRQHiyLw5

The deadline for abstract submissions was 13th July 2021.

Abstract Submission Guidelines

Abstracts are limited to 3,000 characters. Submission should include an informative title, author list, affiliations, and abstract text.

The abstract should summarise the research in a concise and informative way, as it is the only information organisers will have when deciding what presentations will be accepted. Abstracts do not have to be structured in sections, however all abstracts should have a brief background statement summarising the basis for the work, and the aim of the work followed by methods, results and a concluding statement to bring the work into context within the research area.

You will also be able to add a brief biography about yourself (maximum 2,000 characters). You can just add links your profile on your organisation’s website if you like.
